Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor and Application Insights to continuously track the performance of the Static Web App, including response times, error rates, and user interactions.
Regularly review and update the dependencies used in the Static Web App to ensure compatibility, security, and performance improvements.
Conduct security audits to identify vulnerabilities in the Static Web App, including reviewing authentication mechanisms and access controls.
Ensure regular backups of the Static Web App configuration, including routing rules, authentication settings, and environment variables.
Verify the functionality of the CI/CD pipeline used for deploying the Static Web App to ensure smooth and error-free deployments.
Check the configuration of custom domains associated with the Static Web App to ensure proper DNS settings and SSL certificate validity.
Analyze performance metrics and implement optimizations, such as reducing asset sizes, enabling caching, and improving load times.
Regularly test authentication and authorization mechanisms to ensure secure access to the Static Web App.
Maintain up-to-date documentation for the Static Web App, including deployment processes, configuration settings, and troubleshooting guides.
Perform failover tests to ensure the Static Web App can recover from outages or disruptions without data loss or service downtime.
Review and update environment variables used in the Static Web App to ensure they are correctly configured and secure.
Evaluate the SLA performance of Azure Static Web Apps to ensure compliance with uptime and performance guarantees.
Provide regular training for the operations team to stay updated on new features, best practices, and troubleshooting techniques for Azure Static Web Apps.
Gather and analyze user feedback to identify areas for improvement in the Static Web App's functionality and performance.
